articles.title: Cooking for Passover in these strange times

articles.author: By PHILISSA CRAMER/JTA
articles.title: Challah-tinkering yeast scientist helps bread-bakers get a good rise
articles.description: Every year after Pesach I buy a one pound bag of yeast and it lasts through the year and I use it to make challah. So I’m still pursuing the quixotic quest to make the perfect challah. ;

articles.title: In the Grain: A baker’s answer to the coronavirus
articles.description: What I do know is, while we are living through an apocalyptic reality, there is an upside to it all: We have our families together, bored out of their minds and furiously looking for things to do. ;

articles.author: 陳曉莉
articles.title: 疫情讓商機盡失，3家旅遊新創著手裁員，售票平台StubHub有逾6成員工放無薪假
articles.description: 武漢肺炎（COVID-19）疫情重創了全球的旅遊業及娛樂業，包括 TripActions、Sonder及Zeus Living等3家旅遊新創，都傳出已展開裁員行動，而售票平台Stubhub則有67%的員工正在放無薪假。

articles.author: 林妍溱
articles.title: 協助抗疫，WHO、臉書合作COVID-19程式黑客松
articles.description: 如果你開發了武漢肺炎App卻被蘋果或Google以不是政府或醫療機構為由下架，這裏還有個可以發光的機會。臉書和世界衛生組織（World Health Organization，WHO）周四宣佈一項程式黑客松#BuildforCOVID19 Global Online Hackathon，以協助防治及對抗武漢肺炎。
